channel.title: Changing Delta NPC drops code? [317 ofc.]
channel.description:
Okay, Basically..
I like Delta because it's easy to work on.
I hate the NPC drops.
Does anybody know how to set it back to the original code?
Example: [code]995;1:100,1:100[/code]
That's the correct one I think.

item.title: Changing Delta NPC drops code? [317 ofc.]
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:2, topic:285562”]What?..

npcdrop = NPCID	ITEMID	AMOUNT	CHANCEOFDROP

Thats delta… delta NPC drops = FAIL because they’re all exact.

if you never worked on anything other then delta… then heres an example

[code]itemid:amount:chance
995:100:2000:1:100

100:2000 = between 100 and 2k
1:100 = 1 in 100 chance.[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Changing Delta NPC drops code? [317 ofc.]
